  • Meeting productivity and quality benchmark defined from time to time
  • Ensuring regular communication with Business Unit personnel to ensure issues are resolved immediately.
  • Ensuring deliverables as per agreed SLA's.

title: Urgent Hiring For Registered Nurse
jobDescription:
• The Nurse has adequate knowledge about the medical/ surgical disease condition and provides comprehensive Nursing care.
  • Assists Doctors for various surgical and medical diagnostic procedures by using aseptic technique.
  • Knows the correct method of collecting and sending specimens to laboratory for diagnostic tests.
  • Demonstrates correct technique of checking and recording Vital signs of the patient
  • Prepares patients for operations and ensures that the preoperative protocols have been followed.
  • Administers medications as per the medication policy
  • Assist patients, relatives and solves their queries
  • Carry out the procedures of Admission, Transfer, Discharge and Death of patient as per hospital policy.
  • Attends to the nutritional needs of the patient.
  • Maintains clean and safe environment for the patient.
  • Coordinates patient care with other departments.
  • Attends/ Takes rounds with the Doctors and carries the orders accordingly.
  • Maintains Aseptic precaution to avoid cross infection
  • Takes responsibility to continuously update the knowledge and be competent with the changing trends in the profession
  • Attends training to update self and improve technical and non technical skills.

RESPONSIBILITIES OF CASUALTY NURSE

1. Assessment of patient who comes in the emergency room, like vital signs, present complaint, past history etc.

2. Keep the proper record of assessment in emergency room nursing assessment.

3. Help the CMO/Consultant for assessment or procedure.

4. Administer the medication as per CMO/Consultant orders & document it properly.

5. In case of admission inform concerned ward and shift the patient with help of housekeeping.

6. Instruct ward clerk about charging through HIMS like consultant visit, investigation, consumables etc.

7. Nurse should know about MLC cases and their documentation like police intimation form, MLC register.

8. Nurse should know about brought dead body, mortuary policies & procedure, documentation.

9. Nurse should be able to manage the mass casualty or multi trauma patients like triage.

RESPONSIBILITIES OF AMBULANCE NURSE

  • The nurse from casualty will attend ambulance call in shifts.
  • In case of the Ambulance call, the ambulance team immediately collects proper information from caller, like name and address of the caller with phone number, condition of the patient, identifiable land mark etc.
  • Calls back to caller to inform that the ambulance has already left the hospital.
  • Takes the proper over of drugs and consumables of ambulance in each shift and checks expiry every month.
  • Check the equipments cleanliness and working condition after every attended call and keeps the ambulance ready for the next call.
  • Nurse should make sure that all proper data of patient are taken during ambulance booking.
  • The ambulance team is ready and must leave within five minute from the time of booking.
  • The nurse should take the ambulance consent from the relatives of the patient, while transporting the patient to the hospital.
  • The nurse should monitor the patient while transporting.
  • Nurse will assist in shifting the patient from ambulance to casualty
  • Accomplishes all charges in HMIS and replaces all medicines and supplies used.

RESPONSIBILITIES OF NURSE IN LABOUR ROOM

  • Nurse should know about the records, e.g. Birth report, delivery register, birth register, still birth report etc.
  • Nurse will help to conduct the deliveries and should know about other critical skills in emergency.
  • Nurse will maintain the records of all deliveries conducted in the hospitals in the birth register with baby’s foot print
  • Nurse ensures identification band for mother and baby
  • Nurse should ensure that the Birth Report book should be sent to MRD Department.
  • Nurse will assist the doctor to conduct the deliveries and she will provide care to mother and child until they are transferred to the wards
  • Nurse is responsible to educate the mother about advantages of breast feeding, burping to prevent aspiration, about Immunization, Perineal care.
  • Nurse should be aware of the medico legal implications of the Labour Room.
  • Nurse should follow infection control protocols strictly.
  • Nurse should follow the proper for disposal of anatomical waste as per BMC guidelines.

RESPONSIBILITIES OF NURSE IN ICU / NICU / PICU

  • Nurse should check the identification band on the wrist of baby/child in each shift.
  • Ensure that infection control protocol is followed strictly before handling babies.
  • The nurse has special technical skills to handle equipments in the intensive care area
  • Nurse has to continuously monitor the haemodynamics of the patient and report immediately to the Intensivist.
  • Nurse keeps all emergencies at the bed side

RESPONSIBILITIES OF NURSE IN CARDIAC CATH LAB

  • Checks the cath lab list for the day and prepare equipment trolley accordingly.
  • Keeps the crash cart ready to handle emergencies..
  • Checks consent, request, allergies, investigations, procedure medications, preparation of the patient including I.V. lines and shaving of site, and peripheral pulses prior to the procedures.
  • Prepare the patient for procedure by taking patient on table, put on warmer for the patient, start on oxygen and I.V.fluids as required.
  • Arranges the trolley with all sterile materials for scrub nurse including syringes, fluids, catheters, medicines and other materials as required.
  • Maintains accurate documentation in the register including the name of the procedure, time of procedure, medications given, name of the doctors and staff involved, and any other relevant information.
  • Follows biomedical waste protocols.
  • Ensures the sterilization of all the instruments used for the procedure after washing, cleaning and counting them.

title: React Native Developer ( iOS / Android )
jobDescription:
We are seeking talented and passionate React Native Developers with over 4+ years of experience in developing advanced applications for the iOS and Android platforms. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of mobile technologies and be able to push the boundaries of mobile development.

Responsibilities:

Design and build advanced applications for the iOS and Android platforms using React Native.

Work with external data sources, third-party payment, and SMS APIs.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.

Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability.

Fix bugs and improve application performance.

Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.

Develop new features and user interfaces from wireframe models.

Ensure the best performance and user experience of the application.

Write clean, readable, and testable code.

Cooperate with back-end developers, designers, and the rest of the team.

Leverage native APIs for deep integrations with both platforms.

Diagnose and fix bugs and performance bottlenecks for performance that feels native.

Stay updated with the latest industry trends, technologies, and best practices.

Requirements and Skills:

Proven working experience in iOS and Android app development with a minimum of 4+ years.

Extensive knowledge of the full mobile development life cycle.

Deep knowledge of iOS and Android mobile platforms.

Experience with iOS and Android SDKs.

Experience working with remote data via REST and JSON.

Proficiency with third-party libraries and APIs.

Solid understanding of the mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies.

Experience in developing React Native apps for both iOS and Android platforms.

Understanding of various navigation models in mobile apps.

Must have worked on hardware integration with apps.

Excellent debugging, testing, and performance optimization skills.

Strong interpersonal skills; a good team player with the ability to deliver in a fast-paced environment.

Experience with writing clean, readable, and testable code.

Key Responsibilities:

Build pixel-perfect, buttery smooth UIs across both mobile platforms.

Ensure deep integrations with both platforms using native APIs.

Diagnose and fix bugs and performance bottlenecks for performance that feels native.

Continuously improve code quality and development efficiency.

Collaborate with team members and stakeholders to deliver high-quality applications

title: Electrician (3rd Party) *Only PWD License holding candidates Can apply
jobDescription:
Responsible to do the routine & non-routine (Project, modification, shutdown & breakdown) electrical works i.e. repair, troubleshoot, functional testing, installation, removal, connection in field & shop floor for improving the operational efficiency of electrical equipment


Roles & Responsibilities:


Responsible for condition monitoring of critical motors, transformers, semi critical motors & capacitors as per schedule and report the deviations to the supervisor

- Act (resolve in consultation) on deviations / problems reported by production team under the supervision of Supervisor / Engineer and updates results to superiors as well as production team

-Install/remove the new or defective electrical equipment with the support of allocated contract agency (in case of heavy equipment) as per instructions from the seniors

- Contribute in management of spares inventory and ensure timely collection/deposition of electrical equipment s at stores

-Conduct functional test of newly received electrical equipment under the guidance of Supervisor / Engineers

-Ensure reliable power source to electrical equipment & systems, share deviations with superiors by measuring with the instruments as per parameters

-Take energy meter reading plant wise for power generation, receiving and consumption, also maintain Diesel stock and communicate the supervisor

- Isolate & restore electrical connection, based on process & maintenance requirements Maintain plant & office lighting, earthing pits & earthing systems

- Inspect & certify the portable tools of contractors i.e. welding machine, drilling machine etc. and maintain the identification tags of the devices

- Repair & test defective electrical equipment in field & workshop and support the supervisor / engineer during troubleshooting in systems

-Maintain housekeeping in area of ownership, i.e. electrical equipment, MCC/PCC/UPS (Uninterruptible power supply) rooms with the help of contract workforce

- Initiate height/cold work permit and co-ordinate with supervisor

- Participate & contribute in work place safety by conducting JSA(Job safety analysis), toolbox talk, contract employee safety, BBS (Behaviour based safety), RCA(Root cause analysis).


Qualification: ITI + NCVT

title: iOS Developer
jobDescription:
Job Title: iOS Developer

Experience Level: 3 - 6 Years

Salary: 7 LPA

Location: Mohali (Punjab)

Job Description:

We are seeking a talented iOS Developer with 3-6 years of experience to join our dynamic team. As an iOS Developer, you will be responsible for developing, enhancing, and maintaining our iOS applications. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement innovative solutions that meet the needs of our users.

Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and maintain iOS applications.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
  • Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
  • Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
  • Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.
  • Participate in code reviews to maintain code quality and ensure adherence to coding standards.
  • Work closely with Product Managers and Designers to deliver the best user experience. Working knowledge of iOS foundation & UIKit framework
  • Experience working with Swift language, Cocoa Pods, Concurrency programming.
  • Good understanding with Alamofire, URL Session & Restful code
  • Good understanding with offline storage Core Data, SQLite, Realm, Plist.
  • Good understanding with storyboard, xib, auto layout, Size Classes.
  • Should have app published in the App Store
  • Should have experience with SOLID principle, MVC, clean code architecture
  • Strong problem solving skills, technical troubleshooting and diagnosing.
  • Good understanding of debugging, performance optimization techniques
  • Experience with RXSwift, react native, flutter will be plus.

Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
  • 2-4 years of experience developing iOS applications.
  • Proficiency in Swift and Objective-C programming languages.
  • Strong understanding of iOS frameworks such as UIKit, Core Animation, Core Data, etc.
  • Experience with RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services.
  • Knowledge of version control systems such as Git.
  • Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle.
  • Experience with performance and memory tuning tools.
  • Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.
  • Ability to work independently and in a team environment.
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience with continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.
  • Familiarity with agile methodologies such as Scrum or Kanban.
  • Experience with third-party libraries and APIs.
  • Published one or more iOS applications in the App Store.
